::Prowl::

Once again the feeling of not being able to remember something 
invaded Prowl's thoughts as his audio receptors picked up Firedrill's 
words. Prowl, a robot on Cybertron. Prowl had lived on Cybertron, but 
he had a feeling that that wasn't what this bot was talking about.

"I'm not sure. I served on Cybertron in the military foces for a 
while, yeah, but I don't think we've met there before."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> Firedrill smiles, this is the type of kindness he enjoyed to be 
> around. "Sounds like i'm in the right place then" he 
says. "Prowl.... 
> I used to know a robot on cybertron named Prowl," He said, "You 
> arent related in any way?" he asked.
